messages.subject: Re: Guns anyone?
messages.msgSnippet: I think so and yes that is what makes it so expensive.  The kids are shooting skeet and at times, two birds will go
messages.messageBody:
<<Does it have to be an over and under?>>

I think so and yes that is what makes it so expensive. The kids are
shooting skeet and at times, two birds will go at the same time so an over
and under is much faster than a regular shotgun. But I talked with my Dad,
a police officer and Pam Hartley's husband was nice enough to give me a line
on a gun auction (Thanks Wally) so maybe we're in business.

Julie

messages.subject: Re: Guns anyone?
messages.msgSnippet: ... I clipped your message and sent it over to my husband, Julie, he s our resident gun nut. :) He s an expert on handguns, not rifles, but he might have some
messages.messageBody:
----------
>From: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2942
>Date: Mon, Jan 27, 2003, 11:56 AM
>

> Looking for anyone with any gun knowledge who might know how to go about
> getting one cheaper. I would just say forget it, but Zach is having soooo
> much fun, I want to try to work this out if we can.


I clipped your message and sent it over to my husband, Julie, he's our
resident gun nut. :) He's an expert on handguns, not rifles, but he might
have some ideas about cheaper places to buy, and I asked him to email you
privately.

Pam
